title: Break My Heart
lyrics:
I auditioned for your heart
Play me like a harp
Made me play the part of the fool
I petitioned for your love and attention
You are an addiction I just can't fuel
And you are the air that I breathe

So toxic for me

A pill I was willing to take

But it's silly to pretend so I gotta go and mend up

The heart that I carefully taught you to break



I taught you to hurt me

Trained you to burn me

Let you desert me, I



You know how to break my heart

You know how to break my heart

And I don't know how you do it

But we try again and then you lie again

You know how to break my heart

You know how to break my heart

But the last time will be the last time

I let you break my heart
